last_episode_to_air.name: Somebody Wants Me Dead
last_episode_to_air.overview: After a series of political uprisings and personal tragedies, Anne's marriage with Henry sours — and her perch at court becomes increasingly precarious.

name: Blood, Sex & Royalty
overview: A modern take on the British royal drama, this steamy series offers a window into the lives of history's deadliest, sexiest and most iconic monarchs.

episodes.name: Boleyns for the Win
episodes.overview: Young Anne Boleyn grows to be a freethinker after spending time at the French court — and her outspoken ways soon catch the eye of a powerful suitor.

episodes.name: Never Let Them See You Cry
episodes.overview: As Henry attempts to find a way out of his marriage, Anne introduces him to the radical — and outlawed — writings of religious reformer William Tyndale.

episodes.name: Somebody Wants Me Dead
episodes.overview: After a series of political uprisings and personal tragedies, Anne's marriage with Henry sours — and her perch at court becomes increasingly precarious.
